captions.text: - So, anyway.
Start, take one.
(orchestral music)

- Well, I wouldn't recommend
me driving a car right now,
but I'm feeling pretty good.
- I'm pretty drunk right now.

- I just wanna say, I haven't
drank in the long time.
It's kinda fun.
- This is mom juice, momma juice.
I'm not especially proud of that,
but it's the truth.
- My pediatrician told me that drink IPA,

that helps with your milk
production and your boobs.

- It is super weird to
have a baby inside you.

- That's the weirdest shit that
anybody can ever deal with.

- I mean, pregnancy is
kind of a nightmare,

and people don't really
talk about that stuff.

- You shit yourself, you
piss yourself, there's blood.
And there was this perfect little child

that came out of all of
it, and it was amazing.
- She came out and I thought she was

the most beautiful thing
I've ever seen in my life.
And then I look back, like recently.

I look back at pictures of
her when she was a baby,

I was like, eeh, she's like
lookin' like an old man.
I don't care, I love her so much.
She looks like a old man, I don't care.
I just love her so much.
- I'm very proud of her,
and that she accomplished everything
that she wanted to accomplish.
- She, she's like, my purpose.
And she's my girl.

- I love her, I love when
she puts her tiny little hand

against my cheek and
says "Mommy, I love you."
And then we close our eyes and take a nap.
And then the next thing that happens
is she shoves a fucking finger up my nose.

- I don't even know what
I used to spend money on
before I had a kid.
Like what do you even do with your money
if you don't have kids?
- I have so much gray hair now.
I used to like have freedom
to do things I wanted to do.
- If it wasn't for Sesame Street,
I wouldn't take a shit by myself.
- I am sometimes not included
in a lot of her friend activity.

I wanna go everywhere, I
mean I feel like I'm young.
I feel I should be in my 20s again.

I feel that I should be welcome
no matter where she goes.

- I mean, there's so much crazy
shit about being a parent,
but also...
It shifts your focus from yourself,
onto this other little person.
- You want everything.
Like all my fun stuff I used to do.
Nothing.

I mean this, nothing
compares to my sweet girl.

- You know, I don't
wanna be like a cool mom.
Like a Regina George cool mom.
I wanna be a good mom.
- Of course I wanna be a cool mom.

But you know what, she
fucking shits herself

in all the places that are
the most inappropriate.
- I'm sorry if I seem cool or uncool.
I don't care, but you know what?

First of all, there are
rules and boundaries,

and I'm gonna try to say
"yes" in the best way,

so you know what, you
don't want your avocado?
Here, have a turkey burger instead.
I'm a softie, what can I say?
- Kids are awesome,

and I think that being pregnant
can be really, really scary.

But I want you to know
that it's gonna be okay.
Your kid is gonna be cool,
and if they're not cool, it's your fault.
- I wanna be a good example for her.
Tonight might not be the best night.
Good thing she's sleeping, right.
- I'm going to the clubs next,
that'd be more fun.
- [Voiceover] I'll take you to the Abbey.
- Is that a gay bar?
- [Voiceover] Yes.
- All right (laughs).
Well I don't do this often, I just--
- [Voiceover] It's a special occasion.
- It's a special occasion.
This is what you do in LA.

You told me, you go to brunch,
get the dog, the tattoo.
It's just what you do.
Buzzyfeed... Buzzy... Busy...
Buzzyfeed. Busy. Busy. Buzzy.
Busy Buzzyfeed. Buzz...
Bees. Buzzyfeed. Buzzeating.
Buzz... Buzz something.
I like to cut my bangs
after two glasses of wine.
I don't really recommend it,

but don't always cut your
bangs after two glasses of wine

'cause it could be crooked,
but mine turned out okay.
Right, they're straight?

title: Drunk Moms Talk About Their Kids
